quote: I am the only candidate who ran in either primary who said I will not raise taxes on the middle class.
quotePlain: I am the only candidate who ran in either primary who said I will not raise taxes on the middle class.
name: Hillary Clinton

checks.quote: Fifteen of the 17 Republican presidential candidates signed pledges not to raise taxes on anyone, which includes the middle class. Thirteen of those candidates signed the vow last year; the other three inked such a pledge earlier in their careers.
checks.quotePlain: Fifteen of the 17 Republican presidential candidates signed pledges not to raise taxes on anyone, which includes the middle class. Thirteen of those candidates signed the vow last year; the other three inked such a pledge earlier in their careers.
